Class InstructionHALT

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.AST

edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.InstructionNoArgs
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.InstructionHALT
public class InstructionHALT
extends InstructionNoArgs
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction HALT.

    • assertOpCode

      public void assertOpCode()
      Description copied from class: Instruction
      Asserts that the opCode token of the instruction has the correct Symbol. Implemented in each instruction by calling the method assertOpCode(Symbol).
